title: You are so faithful
verses:
You are so faithful
so faithful, so faithful.
You are so faithful
so faithful, so faithful.

That's why I praise you
in the morning
That's why I praise you
in the noontime.
That's why I praise you
in the evening
That's why I praise you
all the time.

You are so loving
so loving, so loving.
You are so loving
so loving, so loving.

You are so caring
so caring, so caring.
You are so caring
so caring, so caring.

You are so mighty
so mighty, so mighty.
You are so mighty
so mighty, so mighty.
